程序包 appliances

类 Microwave

java.lang.Object
appliances.Appliance
appliances.Microwave
public class Microwave extends Appliance
The Microwave class represents a specific type of appliance that extends the Appliance class. It adds additional attributes for capacity and room type, providing methods to manipulate and display those attributes. This class overrides the saveToString method to format the data for file storage. Also overrides the toString method to make sure the format when printing out.
从以下版本开始:
2024-09-19
作者:
Tianzi Cui
